'''Tiny Miracle's Earrings''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Tiny Miracle]].

==Description==
An inexpensive pair of earrings made from metal that shines like the stars.<br />What the sellers don't know is that the shine of these earrings comes from the fallen stars of ancient times.
